Details.Name: sc_card_name
Details.Feature: DBS Live Fresh Visa Card

Details.Name: sc_main_benefit
Details.Feature: Receive annual fee waiver for 2 years.
Card is automatically enrolled for Ez-Reload.

Earn 3x DBS Points on Online Purchases, Overseas spend and Visa payWave transactions. Earn 3x DBS Points at travel sites such as Agoda, AirAsia, AirBnB, Expedia, JetStar, PandaBed, TigerAir and Scoot.

Details.Name: sc_gift_details
Details.Feature: Up to S$120 Cashback:
1. S$70 Cashback when you charge a min. of S$700 per month for the first 2 months AND
2. S$50 Cashback when you apply for DBS Cashline at the same time

Details.Name: sc_gift_cond
Details.Feature: Apply for the card before 31 March 2016.

Details.Name: sc_other_fee
Details.Feature: Fee Waiver

Details.Name: sc_disclosure
Details.Feature: Each EZ-Reload amount is set at S$40 and a convenience fee of S$0.25 may be chargeable by EZ-Link for each successful EZ-Reload transaction.
Earn 1 DBS point for every S$5 charged to the card.

Details.Name: sc_cashback_details
Details.Feature: Receive 6% Cashback on online purchases From 1 Jan 2016 to 29 Feb 2016 (with min spend of $500 per month, capped at $100 per month)

Details.Name: sc_dining_details
Details.Feature: $5 = 1 DBS Point
3X DBS Points on overseas spend and local Visa payWave
Enjoy discounts at over 1,000 outlets islandwide with the DBS Indulge program

Details.Name: sc_rewards_details
Details.Feature: $5 = 1 DBS Point
Enjoy 3X DBS Points on your travel bookings, overseas spend, every EZ-Reload auto top-up, and local Visa payWave transactions
Enjoy 3X DBS Points on your online shopping

Details.Name: sc_shopping_details
Details.Feature: Receive 6% Cashback on online purchases From 1 Jan 2016 to 29 Feb 2016 (with min spend of $500 per month, capped at $100 per month)
$5 = 1 DBS Point
Plus, enjoy 3X DBS Points on your online shopping, overseas spend and local visa PayWave

Details.Name: sc_main_image
Details.Feature: ./images/DBS Live Fresh Visa Card.png
